com.ooyala.android.player
Class MoviePlayer

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      com.ooyala.android.player.Player
          com.ooyala.android.player.MoviePlayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
OoyalaAdPlayer, VASTAdPlayer
public class MoviePlayer
extends Player

A wrapper around android.media.MediaPlayer http://developer.android.com/reference/android/media/MediaPlayer.html For a list of Android supported media formats, see: http://developer.android.com/guide/appendix/media-formats.html
